def pnm.math.Math.getPointIn2dTriangle (   _p,
  _t1,
  _t2,
  _t3 
)

Test, in 2D, if a point is within a triangle Sime Side Technique from: http://www.blackpawn.com/texts/pointinpoly/default.html (accessed 29/04/10).

Parameters:
_p - OGRE Vector2 point to be tested
_t1 - OGRE Vector2 first triangle vertex
_t2 - OGRE Vector2 second triangle vertex
_t3 - OGRE Vector2 third triangle vertex
Returns:
True if the point is within the triangle
